title: Add uploaded photo to Demo & Media section

requirements.text: Add the user-uploaded image "WhatsApp Image 2026-02-06 at 9.23.49 AM.jpeg" to the frontend static assets and display it in the Demo & Media section.

quotes: add this image in demo and media

acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded image file is added to the repo under a stable public path (e.g., within `frontend/public/assets/`), with a reasonable, URL-safe filename.
`frontend/src/siteConfig.ts` is updated so `siteConfig.media.images` includes the correct public URL for the added image (e.g., `/assets/...`).

The Demo & Media section renders the image in the existing image grid (via `frontend/src/components/sections/DemoMediaSection.tsx`) and no longer shows the "Demo content coming soon" placeholder when the image is present.
The page builds successfully and the image loads correctly in the browser without requiring backend changes.

constraints: Do not modify files in `frontend/src/components/ui` or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Do not route demo/media images through the backend; serve them as frontend static assets.
nonGoals: Implementing image uploads from the UI or storing media dynamically.
